DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate safety immunogenicity 2015-2016 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal Quadrivalent vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age , 2015-2016 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . Primary Objective : - To describe safety 2015-2016 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal Quadrivalent vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age safety 2015-2016 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . Observational Objectives : - To describe immunogenicity 2015-2016 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal Quadrivalent vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age immunogenicity 2015-2016 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . - To evaluate compliance , term immunogenicity , study vaccine ( Fluzone Quadrivalent , Fluzone Intradermal Quadrivalent , Fluzone High-Dose ) applicable age group historical requirement Committee Human Medicinal Products ( CHMP ) Note Guidance ( NfG ) Committee Propriety Medicinal Products ( CPMP ) - CHMP NfG CPMP/BWP/214/96 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Fluzone® Quadrivalent , Fluzone® Intradermal Quadrivalent , Fluzone® High-Dose , Influenza Vaccines Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Adults age 18 < 65 year randomly assign receive either Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal Quadrivalent vaccine adult age ≥ 65 year randomly assign receive either Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone High-Dose vaccine . All subject receive single dose randomly assign vaccine . They follow Visit 1 Visit 2 evaluation safety outcome . Solicited adverse reaction collect 7 day vaccination . Unsolicited non-serious adverse event ( AEs ) serious adverse event ( SAEs ) collect Visit 1 Visit 2 .
